Author: danw
Title: Top mobile apps are extensions of web apps?

Author: palish
Content:
This will be really useful for those of you who need to test your webapp on Safari, but only run windows. Actually, I'm probably the only one who does that.

Also, if you're going to develop a webapp for the iPhone, get it working on Safari and it will just work on the iPhone. So says Steve..

Shawn

Content: I doubt that MS would really change their formula editor's output format for Science or Nature. This problem probably affects less than 0.1% of all users.
